divs: Sighting DetailsI don't want any.publicity. I simply want to know what I saw. I was with four friends crossing gwb bridge. I noticed object I told the person sitting next to me to look p.m. he seen it as well. It didn't do anything but rock side to side and shoot out a white beam of light very quickly.on and off. It was black or at least.silhouetted in black. One solid red light on both ends. It was weird to say tokhe very least and very close to the bridge. I can make a sketch if u like.
Summary: I was behind driver seat. we were crossing gwb bridge. I seen object hovering rocking side to side. one red solid light on each side. a white beam of light would come out of it shooting on and off
trends: There has been one other sighting in Fort Lee
There were no other sightings in Fort Lee on or around June 1st 2012
